name: Stickies and Labels
description:
Hello!

I came up with these stickers and labels during work. When I need to mark something, I made them quickly on the fly.

Now I am just organizing and sharing them with community. They are quite handy for me, I hope you found them useful too, or at least fun!


Release Note

v1.1.0 - 20211117

added: Jumbo section label

update: section labels now can toggle date on/off

Fix: removed all “Frame 100xx” named layers.

1.0.3 - 20210507

  • added: Star Rating
  • new use cases

1.0.2 - 20210412

  • add: Section Label

1.0.1 - 20210301

  • add: vault boy, hmmmm; modify: dots made not as variants

1.0.0 - 20210209

  • update: sticky notes (sm,md,lg,xl)
  • update: new naming with frames
  • New: thumbmail reads: “stickies and labels”
  • New: “archived” thumbnail sticker
  • Fix: “back up” stickers
  • Fix: make “impact labels” not varient
  • Fix: removed “welcome” page

0.2.0

  • added a few more, ready to publish

0.1.0

  • initial publish
